pinyin: Mei3 guo2 Hang2 kong1 Gong1 si1

definition: beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]

public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
to take charge of/to manage/department (under a ministry)

sentences.english: He flew on El Al a few months before he flew on US airline.
sentences.chinese: 他乘坐美國航空公司的幾個月前他飛以色列艾拉。

sentences.english: It's No. 302 on the third floor.
sentences.chinese: 這是美國航空公司302次班機。

sentences.english: US Airways offers last-minute international fares on Friday morning, Banas says.
sentences.chinese: 美國航空公司在週五早上提供“最後一分鐘”機票。

sentences.english: The plane holds 144 passengers, according to the US Airways website.
sentences.chinese: 據美國航空公司網站信息，該機承載144名旅客。
